channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 英国は、グーグル広告のようなソーシャルメディアや広告プラットフォームに対し、偽の有名人推薦やマルウェア付きポップアップを含む詐欺広告の停止を強制する計画だ（Thomas Seal/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Seal / Bloomberg:
The UK plans to force social media and ad platforms like Google Ads to stop scam ads including fake celebrity endorsements and pop-ups with malware  —  - Ad-tech will be forced to crack down on scam advertisements  — Measures are intended to complement the Online Safety Bill

item.title: 英ガーディアン紙、創始者の奴隷制度との関係を受け、英米を含む社会的地位の低いコミュニティに関する報道を改善するため7人のジャーナリスト職を創設（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
The Guardian creates seven journalist jobs to improve its coverage of underrepresented communities, including in the UK and US, after its founder's slavery ties  —  The roles include dedicated correspondents for the Caribbean, Africa and South America.  —  The Guardian is creating seven …

item.title: リーチ社、売上高は前年同期比6.1％減の2億7,940万ポンド、営業利益は同23.5％減の3,610万ポンド。
item.description:
Dominic Ponsford / Press Gazette:
Reach reports revenue fell 6.1% YoY to £279.4M and operating profit dropped 23.5% YoY to £36.1M; print revenue fell 2.7% YoY and digital slid 16.1% YoY  —  Reach half-year results hit by falling page views and lower online ad yields.  —  The UK's largest regional news publisher Reach …

item.title: インスタグラム、オーストラリア、ブラジル、カナダ、フランス、ドイツ、イタリア、日本、メキシコ、スペイン、英国でクリエイター購読を展開、米国でのサポートを拡大（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Instagram rolls out creator subscriptions in Australia, Brazil, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Spain, and the UK, expanding on support in the US  —  Meta announced today that it's rolling out Instagram subscriptions to all eligible creators in Australia, Brazil, Canada …

item.title: スポティファイ、第2四半期の売上高は前年同期比11％増の32億ユーロ、プレミアム会員数は同17％増の2億2000万人、MAUは同27％増の5億5100万人、調整後営業損失は1億1200万ユーロ（Ashley Carman/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Spotify reports Q2 revenue rose 11% YoY to €3.2B, Premium subscribers grew 17% YoY to 220M, MAUs rose 27% YoY to 551M, and a €112M adjusted operating loss  —  Spotify Technology SA, the Swedish audio streaming platform, beat analyst expectations in its second-quarter results …

item.title: NetflixがiOSで「My Netflix」タブを展開、「Downloads」タブに代わり、ダウンロード、視聴リスト、リマインダーなどを提供、Androidでは8月に「My Netflix」を提供（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Netflix rolls out a My Netflix tab on iOS, superseding the Downloads tab to offer downloads, watch lists, reminders, and more; Android gets My Netflix in August  —  Netflix has rolled out a new feature designed to — what else? — get you to stream as much as possible on the service.

item.title: アダニ・グループによるNDTVの買収で、独立の声はほとんど聞かれなくなった。
item.description:
Vidya Krishnan / Nieman Reports:
A look at NDTV, India's last mainstream TV network willing to critically cover the Modi government, as Adani Group's NDTV takeover leaves few independent voices  —  The hostile takeover of NDTV — one of India's last channels willing to report critically on the Modi government …

item.title: DGA、WGA、SAG-AFTRAのメンバーであるジャスティン・ベイトマンに、AIが業界をどう変えるか、ストライキのタイミングの重要性などについてQ&A（Justin Hendrix/Tech Policy Press）
item.description:
Justin Hendrix / Tech Policy Press:
Q&A with Justine Bateman, a member of the DGA, the WGA, and SAG-AFTRA, on how AI may change the industry, the importance of the timing of the strike, and more  —  Audio of this conversation is available via your favorite podcast service.  —  Artificial intelligence will likely impact every type of job.

item.title: 以前の大きなストライキはハリウッドの形を変え、リアリティTVの台頭に拍車をかけた。
item.description:
Washington Post:
The previous big strikes reshaped Hollywood and fueled reality TV's rise; the current ones will likely turn established actors into TikTok stars and vice versa  —  The last big strikes reshaped the movie business and fueled the rise of reality TV.  The latest walkout likely …

item.title: テレグラフ・メディア・グループ、2022年売上高は前年比4％増の2億5,420万ポンド、デジタル購読料収入は同31％増の5,790万ポンド、購読者数は同2％増の73万4,000人（Dominic Ponsford/Press Gazette調べ）。
item.description:
Dominic Ponsford / Press Gazette:
The Telegraph Media Group reports 2022 revenues up 4% YoY to £254.2M, digital subscription revenue up 31% YoY to £57.9M, and subscriptions up 2% YoY to 734K  —  Telegraph reports 2022 profit boost and strong outlook for 2023.  —  The Telegraph Media Group has reported growing profit …

item.title: MailchimpのオーナーであるIntuitは、SMB MediaLabsを立ち上げ、広告主がQuickBooksの710万人の顧客をターゲットにソーシャルメディア、オンラインパブリッシャー、CTVなどを利用できるようにする（Catherine Perloff/Adweek）
item.description:
Catherine Perloff / Adweek:
Mailchimp owner Intuit is launching SMB MediaLabs, which lets advertisers target QuickBooks' 7.1M customers on social media, online publishers, CTV, and more  —  Targeting QuickBooks' customers across digital media is a promising new revenue line  —  Financial services giant Intuit …

item.title: マンディアント：中国のPR会社がニュースワイヤー・サービスを利用して、ピッツバーグ・ポスト・ガゼット（ワシントン・ポスト）を含む32以上の米国ニュースメディアのサブドメインに親北コンテンツを掲載した。
item.description:
Washington Post:
Mandiant: a Chinese PR firm used newswire services to place pro-Beijing content on the subdomains of 32+ US news outlets, including the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette  —  Welcome to The Cybersecurity 202!  Tim here.  If you're remotely interested in boxing, or maybe even if you aren't, you'll definitely want to be watching Saturday night.

item.title: NPRは、エディス・チャピンをニュース担当SVP兼編集長に指名した。彼女は2012年にNPRに入社後、2022年秋から同職を代理で務めていた（David Folkenflik/NPR）
item.description:
David Folkenflik / NPR:
NPR names Edith Chapin as its SVP for news and editor-in-chief; she's been serving in the position on an acting basis since fall 2022, after joining NPR in 2012  —  NPR has moved to shore up its leadership at a time of significant transition, naming veteran news leader Edith Chapin …

item.title: 情報筋MLSシーズンパス、シーズンチケット所有者を含め100万人に迫る。
item.description:
Sports Business Journal:
Sources: MLS Season Pass is nearing 1M subs including season-ticket holders; team execs say they are frustrated due to lack of transparency in viewership stats  —  Apple's Eddy Cue began speaking to a room filled with MLS owners and executives last week in Washington, D.C. …

item.title: 情報筋ディズニーは2023年以降の映画公開スケジュールを見直しており、ストライキを起こした俳優が映画の宣伝に協力しないため、いくつかのタイトルを延期する可能性がある（Thomas Buckley/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Buckley / Bloomberg:
Sources: Disney is reviewing its film release schedule for the rest of 2023 and may delay some titles because striking actors won't help promote the pictures  —  The discussions are at an early stage, but could impact films including Poor Things, Next Goal Wins, Wish and Magazine Dreams, which are all slated for release this year.
